name: forked-extensions
title: Forked Extensions
description: Efficiently manage your forked Raycast extensions using Git sparse-checkout.
author: litomore

preferences.name: githubPersonalAccessToken
preferences.title: GitHub Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Optional. Your GitHub's personal access token. This only needs to be configured when you want to use another account for operations. Required scope is: 'repo'.

preferences.name: repositoryConfigurationPath
preferences.title: Repository Path
preferences.description: Path to the repository where the extension is located.

preferences.name: gitRemoteType
preferences.title: Git Remote Type
preferences.description: Choose the type of Git remote to use for the repository.

preferences.name: gitExecutableFilePath
preferences.title: Git Executable File Path
preferences.description: Path to the Git executable file. If not set, it will use `git` as default. You may need to set this if `git` is not in your PATH environment variable. On Windows, if the path contains spaces, it will be wrapped with double quotes, e.g., `"C:\Program Files\Git\cmd\git.exe"`.
